result.arabic_text: ۞ لِّلَّذِينَ أَحۡسَنُواْ ٱلۡحُسۡنَىٰ وَزِيَادَةٞۖ وَلَا يَرۡهَقُ وُجُوهَهُمۡ قَتَرٞ وَلَا ذِلَّةٌۚ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡجَنَّةِۖ هُمۡ فِيهَا خَٰلِدُونَ
result.translation: Abemeramana bumvira Imana Allah bakubahiriza n’amabwirizwa yayo, bakanayisenga mu bugwaneza nk’aho bayibona, baragenewe Ubwami bw’ijuru, vyongeye bazobona Imana Allah ukuri kwamye, ntibazorengwa n’intumo, eka ntibazonasuzugurika ngo bijirirwe ku musi w’izuka. Abo ni bo bantu rero bo mu Bwami bw’ijuru, bazobubamwo ibihe bidahera.
